name: Bagger
description:
A "bag management" simulator, Bagger is inspired by thousands of hours in MMOs, realizing it's all just "find me a bunch of these". Now you can experience all the riveting thrills of completing quests without having to do any of the grind!

Made in less than a week using Libgdx. The first of hopefully many small games made in less than a week to participate in r/gameaweek. This game completed in ~3 days (and it shows!)

It's also open source!

How to play

Your goal is to complete quests (listed along the right side).

Things come in to your inventory steadily. When you have the required items, click "Complete this!" by that request.

If you need more space or you just don't have the right items, throw the oldest ones out with "Delete oldest" on the left!

Credits:

  • Gichco (Music)
  • Iwan "qubodup" Gabovitch (Sound)
  • Kenney (UI art)
  • Henrique Lazarini (Item art)
  • icbat (Glueing this thing together)
